name: UniProt_get_entry_by_accession
description: Get the complete JSON entry for a specified UniProtKB accession.

fields.output_description: Returns the complete UniProtKB entry JSON for that accession.

name: UniProt_get_function_by_accession
description: Extract functional annotations from UniProtKB entry (Comment type = FUNCTION).

fields.output_description: Returns a list of all functional paragraph texts from that entry.

name: UniProt_get_recommended_name_by_accession
description: Extract the recommended protein name (recommendedName) from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns the recommended protein full name string.

name: UniProt_get_alternative_names_by_accession
description: Extract all alternative names (alternativeNames) from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all alternative name strings.

name: UniProt_get_organism_by_accession
description: Extract the organism scientific name from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns the organism scientific name string, e.g., "Homo sapiens".

name: UniProt_get_subcellular_location_by_accession
description: Extract subcellular localization annotations from UniProtKB entry (Comment type = SUBCELLULAR LOCATION).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all annotated subcellular localization locations.

name: UniProt_get_disease_variants_by_accession
description: Extract all variants (feature type = VARIANT) and their related annotations from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns a list of all variant feature objects, including position, original residue, variant residue, and disease annotations.

name: UniProt_get_ptm_processing_by_accession
description: Extract all PTM and processing sites from UniProtKB entry (feature type = MODIFIED RESIDUE or SIGNAL, etc.).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all modification sites and signal peptide feature objects.

name: UniProt_get_sequence_by_accession
description: Extract the canonical sequence from UniProtKB entry.

name: UniProt_get_isoform_ids_by_accession
description: Extract all splice isoform IDs from UniProtKB entry (isoformNames).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all isoform ID strings.

name: UniProt_search
description: Search UniProtKB database using flexible query syntax. Supports gene names (e.g., 'gene:TP53'), protein names, organism filters (e.g., 'organism:9606'), and complex queries using AND/OR operators. Returns matching proteins with accession numbers and key information. Use this to find UniProt accessions from gene or protein names.

query.description: Search query. Can be simple (e.g., 'MEIOB') or advanced ('gene:TP53 AND organism:9606'). Keywords: gene, protein_name, organism, reviewed, etc.

organism.description: Optional organism filter. Can use common name ('human') or taxonomy ID ('9606'). Automatically combined with query using AND.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 25, max: 500)

fields.description: Optional list of fields to return. Default returns: accession, id, protein_name, gene_names, organism, length

name: UniProt_id_mapping
description: Map IDs between different databases (e.g., Ensembl to UniProt, Gene Name to UniProt). Supports batch mapping and async task processing. Use this to convert between different database identifiers.

ids.description: ID(s) to map. Can be single string or array of strings, e.g., 'ENSG00000141510' or ['MEIOB', 'TP53']

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time to wait for async task completion in seconds (default: 30)
